value_proposition.title: Strategic Clarity
value_proposition.description:
Sprint-App transforms scattered requirements, dependencies, and tasks into a single visual map.
No more juggling spreadsheets or siloed tools â€” strategy, execution, and resources finally speak the same language.

product_descriptor.title: Structured Control
product_descriptor.description:
Sprint-App is a project management platform that models projects with milestones, stories, tasks, risks, and allocations.
It gives teams a structured yet flexible view, aligning business goals with technical execution through the YARDI method.
